verses.verse: Moreover <S%H5307><s%>, when ye shall divide by lot the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, a holy <S%H6944>portion<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7341>reeds<s%>, and the breadth shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>: it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> in all the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Of this there shall be for the holy <S%H6944>place<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in length by <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in <S%H7251>breadth<s%>, square round <S%H5439>about<s%>; and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> for the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And of this <S%H4060>measure<s%> shalt thou <S%H4058>measure<s%> a <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and a <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>: and in it shall be the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, which is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

It is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion of the <S%H776>land<s%>; it shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, that come <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and it shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> for their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and a holy <S%H4720>place<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

And <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, shall be unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, for a <S%H272>possession<s%> unto <S%H6242>themselves<s%>, for twenty <S%H3957>chambers<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, side by <S%H5980>side<s%> with the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1004>portion<s%>: it shall be for the whole house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And whatsoever is for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be on the one side and on the other side of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> and in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>; and in <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions<s%>, from the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> unto the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>.

In the <S%H776>land<s%> it shall be to him for a <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and my <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall no more <S%H3238>oppress<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>; but they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.

Thus <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> <S%H5387>you<s%>, O princes of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; take <S%H7311>away<s%> your <S%H1646>exactions<s%> from my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
Ye shall have <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%>, and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah<s%>, and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1324>bath<s%>.

The <S%H374>ephah<s%> and the <S%H1324>bath<s%> shall be of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8506>measure<s%>, that the <S%H1324>bath<s%> may <S%H5375>contain<s%> the tenth <S%H4643>part<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer<s%>, and the <S%H374>ephah<s%> the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer<s%>: the <S%H4971>measure<s%> thereof shall be after the <S%H2563>homer<s%>.

And the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>; <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, shall be your <S%H4488>maneh<s%>.

This is the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> that ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%>: the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> from a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%>; and ye shall give the sixth <S%H8341>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> from a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>;

and the set <S%H2706>portion<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, of the <S%H1324>bath<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, the tenth <S%H4643>part<s%> of a <S%H1324>bath<s%> out of the <S%H3734>cor<s%>, which is <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%>, even a <S%H2563>homer<s%>; (for <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> are a <S%H2563>homer<s%>;)

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7716>lamb<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, out of two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, from the <S%H4945>well-watered<s%> pastures of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;â€”for a <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, and for a <S%H4503>burnt-offering<s%>, and for <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5002>them<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall give unto this <S%H8641>oblation<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall be the <S%H5387>prince<s%>'s part to give the <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offerings<s%>, and the <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>, in the <S%H2282>feasts<s%>, and on the new <S%H2320>moons<s%>, and on the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, in all the appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, and the <S%H4503>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, in the first day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H4201>door-posts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>ledge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and upon the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>.

And so thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> for every <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H7686>erreth<s%>, and for him that is <S%H6612>simple<s%>: so shall ye make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H702>month<s%>, in the fourteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, ye shall have the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

And upon that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for himself and for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and <S%H8163>a<s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram<s%>, and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H2568>month<s%>, in the fifteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H2282>feast<s%>, shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> the like the <S%H7637>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; according to the <S%H5930>sin-offering<s%>, according to the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and according to the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and according to the <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
